title: Sync Schemas Generator Options
description: Detect when schema.json files are out of sync with Zod definitions

dryRun.describe: Print what would be done without making changes

include.describe: Glob patterns for config files to include

exclude.describe: Glob patterns for config files to exclude

fix.describe: Automatically fix sync issues instead of just reporting them

fromPkg.describe: Path to Nx plugin package.json for auto-deriving schemas from executors/generators

config.describe: Path to a configuration file (auto-detected if not provided)

tsconfig.describe: Path to TypeScript configuration for resolving config files

exportName.describe: Name of the export in the schema module (default: 'default')

skipFormat.describe: Skip formatting generated files with Prettier
